name: Ralf Schumacher
introduction: Ralf Schumacher (born June 30th, 1975 in Hrth-Hermlheim, Rhein-Erft-Kreis, North Rhine-Westphalia, West Germany) is a race car driver from Kerpen, Germany. He is the younger brother of Michael Schumacher. In his career, he drove for Jordan, Williams, and Toyota, winning six races. All of his wins came from his stint at Williams-BMW. Since retiring from F1 after not being able to find a drive for the 2008 season, Schumacher has raced in DTM touring cars.
